QuestData.Title: Eliminate the Okril'lon
QuestData.Description: The Horde are a nuisance that we will deal with, but they are proving more difficult than previously expected. You are to put a stop to this.$b$bTo the west of Nethergarde, the Okril'lon main forces press on our defenses. They currently hold the Nethergarde Mines, and they mean to move into the supply camps and, eventually, the Keep. Thin their numbers and delay their advance, $n.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 9 Okril'lon Infantry at the Nethergarde Supply Camp.
QuestData.RewardText: You're an excellent asset to the Alliance and the Kirin Tor, $n. Well done.$b$bWith time, our forces will retake the mine and press these Horde dogs out of the Blasted Lands.
